Uses of Class
display.Display

  • Packages that use Display 
    Package Description
    games  

    • Uses of Display in games

      Fields in games declared as Display 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Display Player.display
      display is used to display the different elements of the game.
      (package private) Display Game.display
      display is used to display the different elements of the game.
      private Display CombineGame.display
      display is used to display the different elements of the game (for example the menu)
      Methods in games that return Display 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Display Player.getDisplay()
      Returns the display
      Display Game.getDisplay()
      Returns the display that allows to make the different displays of the game.
      Display CombineGame.getDisplay()
      Returns the display that allows to make the different displays of the game.
      Methods in games with parameters of type Display 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Player.setDisplay(Display pDisplay)
      Allows to define the display
      void Game.setDisplay(Display pDisplay)
      Allow to define the display used to make the displays
      private void CombineGame.setDisplay(Display pDisplay)
      Allow to define the display used to make the displays
      Constructors in games with parameters of type Display 
      Constructor and Description
      ComputerPlayer(String pPlayerName, Display pDisplay)
      Constructor of the ComputerPlayer class
      Game(GameModes pGameMode, Display pDisplay)
      Game's constructor

      The constructor initiates the various variables and starts the game with the desired mode
      HumanPlayer(String pPlayerName, Display pDisplay)
      Constructor of the HumanPlayer class.
      Mastermind(GameModes pGameMode, Display pDisplay)
      Constructor of the Mastermind class.
      MoreLess(GameModes pGameMode, Display pDisplay)
      Constructor of the MoreLess class.
      Player(String pPlayerGame, Display pDisplay)
      Player's class constructor

      The name and display are initialized from the parameters provided to the constructor
